title: AE插件-点线面三维粒子特效 Plexus v3.2.9 Win
author: 大众脸
content: 强大的 Plexus 粒子插件拥有众多功能，制作点线面三维粒子效果非常的方便，渲染速度快，支持3D模型导入。你可以将3D模型，存储为兼容性高的OBJ格式，导入AE可作为粒子发射器。你还可以借助路径，和文字以及灯光创建粒子发射，操作模式有违常规。同时直接提供多种自定义特效，分形，颜色，球形场和阴影……Plexus is a next-gen particle engine for After Effects that lets you create, manipulate and visualize data in a procedural manner. Not only you can render the particles, but also create all sorts of interesting relationships between them based on various parameters. The workflow for Plexus is very modular allowing you to create truly infinite set of configurations and parameters.

other.v3.2.9更新内容: 新功能-变换效应器现在可以利用 AE 层来驱动变换。
